parameters: There doesn't seem to be anything I can read...
It seems that all the research material that can't be seen has been put away.

It seems that all the research material that can't be seen has been put away.
There doesn't seem to be anything I can read...
It seems that all the research material that can't be seen has been put away.
Looks like the warden's research journal.。Do you want to read it?
Research Diary, Volume 5, Day 960 of Research
I've been doing research on my own for less than three years.。
It's nice and easy, but my room is so dirty I could use a housekeeper.。
But the results of a recent study, this is not very good.。
As it turned out, he succeeded.。
The so-called brainwashing that changes people's brains.。
It works directly on human brain waves, and the thoughts of others.
I've figured out how to manipulate it easily to some extent.。
Now it's called○○It makes me want to or○○ It's just a feeling.
It's only a vague, moody brainwashing.
Any further research would have more definite results.。
But we've only had success with experimental organisms.。
Let's hope it doesn't work on humans.。
I've done some clinical trials of my own, and it seems the experiment has worked.。
I'm a bread man every morning.。
And yet, irradiating radio waves that make me want to eat curry and rice in the morning...
I'd spent the morning devouring slow-cooked curry.
For three days, that's nine meals.。
Ichi in his prime○I don't eat that much.。
However, if you eat curry in the morning
curry in the morning。Very healthy indeed.。
I was writing down some good stuff to present at the conference.
The sun has gone down drastically.。
He left no trace of this research, no paperwork on brainwashing.
Furthermore, we must ensure that no one can reach this realm for the next 100 years.
They spread theories to the world that are different from their own research results.
We'll just have to make them lose interest in wavelengths.。
For example, we can use magic, which requires a high level of knowledge and skill.
Manipulation and brainwashing is not a realm that can be reached by ordinary people in the first place.。
Therefore, it is unlikely that anyone will try to take advantage of it.。
Once created, it can be exercised by anyone.。
I can do more to help people with their health, longevity, etc.
There are some unfamiliar rationales that old people like that would jump on.
Next thing you know, I'll be an old man.。
That's what got me interested in this field in the first place.
It's just an idea I had when I was middle-aged and had a back injury.。
What an irony that I would arrive at brainwashing without any relief from the pain in my back.。
A man in a suspicious hood came to visit the institute.。
If you have any good research results, please let us commercialize them.
The man's eyes flickered over to the pile of books.
That book, of course, is my research record.。
It also says something about brainwashing.。
These eyes are not the eyes of good intentions, trying to take something from another person.。
They're the eyes of an evil man, trying to deceive people.。
But I have not lived long for nothing.。
I'm used to this sort of thing.。
I'm going to pretend to be a bad researcher, and I'm going to pretend that I'm not interested in the results of my research.
They acted as if it was the great discovery of the century that they had spent their whole lives discovering.
I made a presentation to the man.。
The man was bitten by a stick-shaped vibrating tool that temporarily improved his stiff shoulders and
A machine that sends ultrasonic waves into the body to improve constipation。
Ultrasound is just a health device if it doesn't have a part to adjust the sound range.。
Certain registers can damage organs, so we've taken that into consideration.。
But... machines are still so rare.
This ultrasound machine is also a layman's view.
It just looks like a gray box to me.。
I took it home with me, satisfied.
Did the eagle's performance really work?
I've made up my mind to get out of this lab as soon as possible.。
I'm going to have a hard time eating all the frozen food.。
Lately, I've been hearing noises other than the wind.。
I have a bad feeling about this.。
Let's move our schedule up three days and leave this institute tomorrow.。
Frozen foods can be chilled in one go.
If we don't eat enough, we'll give it to the animals in the mountains.。
My favorite pasta, pescatore, is the only one I've ever had.
Also, I hope the smoke from burning the materials isn't a fire in the lab.
I'll have to tell Juki's town in advance.。
Looks like the warden's research journal.。Do you want to read it?

It looks like the reconstruction is over.
You said you've run with the bulls and sheep.
Oh, it was a personal story...
I got headbutted repeatedly in the buttocks and sides.
He said it was hard work.
Well... the Iwadeyamasan watching outside the fence...
I came up with it while I was working on another invention.
We call it the Matador Cloak.
I got the idea from bullfighters in countries with a culture of fighting bulls.
It can move and blow away approaching creatures.
The advantage of this is that anyone can use it right away without any training.
I'll give it to you, in the interest of gathering data.
Yeah, they're walking all over the place.
I think you're the best man for the job.
Instead, since we're still in the prototype stage, we'll use the cows and sheep from the farm.
You can only avoid them three times at a time.
Some monsters, like worms, are not based on the number of times they are evaded.
You'll drain the cloak of its original durability.
I can avoid it ten times if I use it right.
If you force it, the cloak will tear in an instant.
Hmmm, how do I keep it from tearing?
If you're about to collide with someone, you need to stop and invite them to stop.
The more they bump into each other, the more likely they are to ruin their cloaks.
Instead, you'll be fine if you get sideswiped.
It's only in head-on collisions that durability tends to diminish.
As I said before, if you can get around them or flank them.
It's calculated to work 10 times, so don't overestimate it.
If it tears, you can bring it back here.
In return, though, I might get paid for the materials.
Now it's going to work on symbolic encounters with demons.

It seems you've had a very eventful life.
You don't have any special powers, do you?
People often say I have potential.
Well, it's not like I have anything to do with it.
I'm sure it's just a fate of sorts.
Hakase is going to make this incident bigger than it is.
Don't do it, it's too tempting. ......
We've had a very long conversation, haven't we?
Now, Arles, do you remember the city of Metus?
If you've been waiting for the upgrade since the first chapter...
It's been three months. You must have forgotten.
Because the returned young men and brainwashed men have returned.
We're probably in the middle of a reconstruction.
So, I'm going to let you take advantage of your magicians and your traveling legs.
I need you to get me supplies that are hard to come by.
You'll need building materials, tools, food.
There's plenty of work to be done there without being asked.
I'm sure you'll be fine on your trip.
Ask around the residents of Metus.
Why don't you give him what he wants?
So I just do what you ask and run an errand out of town?
I'll try to help restore Metus.
There are some things that only we, outsiders, can do.
Glad to hear the good news, Arles.
You're quite the softy, aren't you, Hakase?　Heh heh heh.
Not as good as you, young man. Mmm-hmm.
Whenever you're free, you can drop by.
Do you want to set up a warp point here?
